text:
I960
Dr. Harry Skomla
Executive Director
NAEB
14 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Harry:
I am in t j jeipt of a mimeographed copy of John Schwarz walder's
letter to Bill Harley. Am 1 to understand from paragraph one of
the above mentioned letter that there has been any change in our
thinking and discussion at the recent Board meeting?
This is merely an inquiry because, as 1 recall, our plans were to
set up an office in Washington, hoping that the organizations
now supporting JCET might coordinate and channel their activities
through our office. I did not understand that we were continuing
the JCET, as such, but would merely offer an outlet to them
through our NAEB Washington office.
Do I understand from the above mentioned letter that Bob Shenkkan
is being approached on the matter of staffing the Washington
office?
Maybe my Interest is Jumping to conclusions. Could you fill me
in on developments thus far.
With kindest regards, I am
Sincerely yours.
RDH/ml
Raymond D. Hurlbert
General Manager
cc: Mr. Bill Harley
